Through the Doplar Effect I Hear a Faint "Follow Meeee!"

159 words written on Mon, Aug 28 2006

Fearless Gearless - Blog Archive - Adventures of Critical Mass

I roll on over to the hot dog stand and ask the guy which way the bikers went. Just as he starts to tell me this dude on a lime green mini (and I mean tiny!) bike goes flyin‚Äô by like a bat outta hell. Through the doplar effect I hear a faint ‚Äúfollow meeee!‚Äù Alrighty, away we go. So here we are, and this guy is peddalin up a storm. I was seriously impressed with his cadence, especially considering that his knees were just about to his ears. He was spinning those wee cranks even faster when standing up.
